title: Hansberry and others on art and identity - claim

content.question: Explain how African Americans used art and literature as an expression of identity in the twentieth century.

frqParts.text: Explain how African Americans used art and literature as an expression of identity in the twentieth century.

topic.text: 3.11: The New Negro Movement and the Harlem Renaissance

skill.text: 1.A: Identify and explain course concepts, developments, and processes.
